entries.title: Publications | National Bank of Belgium
entries.text: You can search for all National Bank publications by date, type, author or keyword. The Bank is committed to sharing the results of its studies and research.

entries.title: Statistics | National Bank of Belgium
entries.text: Here you can access all publications and figures, a comprehensive calendar of upcoming updates and an overview of all contact details per statistical domain.

entries.title: Monetary policy implementation | National Bank of Belgium
entries.text: The implementaton of monetary policy by the Eurosystem aims to steer short-term market interest rates by using the ECB's key interest rates as anchorage points.

entries.title: Institutional framework of monetary policy | National Bank of Belgium
entries.text: The monetary policy of the EMU is conducted by the Eurosystem, which is made up of the ECB and the NCBs of the EU Member States whose currency is the euro.

entries.title: Monetary policy decision-making | National Bank of Belgium

entries.text: Consumer confidence remains stable and above its long-term average. View the infographic on the evolution of consumer confidence in July.
